definition: (idiom) blind as a bat (figuratively)/unaware of who (or what) one is dealing with/to fail to recognize what sb a bit more perceptive would
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: One has to be blind not to recognize this fact.
sentences.chinese: 一個有眼無珠的人才會看不清這個事實。
